tool_description: Validates recommendations against inventory levels and supply chain constraints to ensure feasibility.

recommended_products.description: List of recommended products to check inventory for

expected_demand.description: Expected demand quantities for each recommended product

time_horizon_days.description: Time horizon for inventory availability check (1-30)

include_alternatives.description: Whether to suggest alternative products for out-of-stock items

error_messages: Invalid product list: One or more recommended_products do not exist in catalog.
Mismatched arrays: recommended_products and expected_demand arrays must have the same length.
Invalid demand values: expected_demand values must be positive integers.
Invalid time horizon: time_horizon_days must be between 1 and 30.
usage: Provide recommended_products and expected_demand arrays, optionally set time_horizon_days and include_alternatives to check inventory feasibility.

inventory_status.description: Inventory status for each recommended product

available_quantities.description: Available inventory quantities for each product
